name: AOC AGON Pro AG275QXL 27" QD-OLED
description: 27-inch QHD QD-OLED monitor with 240Hz refresh rate. Features quantum dot enhancement, 0.03ms response time, and AOC's best gaming features at competitive pricing.

reviews.review_text: QD-OLED at under 800 dollars. Incredible value.
Colors are stunning. Gaming is transformed.
Stand is basic but display quality is top tier.
